item.title: ACA NEOGEO Selection Vol. 7 and 8 announced for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Due out on November 6 in Japan.

SNK has announced ACA NEOGEO Selection Vol. 7 and ACA NEOGEO Selection Vol. 8 for Switch. Both will launch on November 6 in Japan for 5,940 yen each. Each collection includes 10 games previously released digitally as ACA NEOGEO titles.

The included titles are as follows:

  • ACA NEOGEO Selection Vol. 7
    • Fatal Fury Special
    • The King of Fighters 2003
    • King of the Monsters 2
    • Metal Slug 5
    • Pleasure Goal: 5 on 5 Mini Soccer
    • Power Spikes II
    • Prehistoric Isle 2
    • Puzzle Bobble
    • World Heroes 2
    • ZuPaPa!
  • ACA NEOGEO Selection Vol. 8
    • Art of Fighting
    • Blue’s Journey
    • Crossed Swords
    • The King of Fighters ’99
    • Kizuna Encounter: Super Tag Battle
    • Metal Slug 2
    • NAM-1975
    • Puzzle Bobble 2
    • Super Sidekicks 2
    • World Heroes 2 Jet

Collections one and two launched on December 12, 2024 in Japan, followed by three and four on April 10, 2025, and five and six today.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/aca-neogeo-selection-vol-7-and-8-announced-for-switch

item.title: Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko for PS4 now available
item.content:encoded:
• PS4

Exorcise demons to protect the town.

The PlayStation 4 version of Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko, the fully voiced ASMR short novel game starring Virtual YouTuber Natsume Kamishiro, is now available via PlayStation Store for $24.99 / £15.99 / €19.99 / 2,420 yen, Rabbitfoot announced.

Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko first launched for Switch and PC via Steam, DLsite, andBOOTH on October 10, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Rabbitfoot:

About

“High-spec fox swordswoman… It’s Lady Natsume Kamishiro!”

VTuber Natsume Kamishiro stars in an ASMR visual novel game! Set out on a monster-slaying adventure with the innocent and carefree fox spirit Natsume! Some of the lines are recorded in an ASMR, allowing you to enjoy intimate and rich communication with Natsume Kamishiro.

Story

The fox spirit “Natsume Kamishiro” is both your partner and a long-time childhood friend with a complicated history. As demon hunters you both bear the significant responsibility of “exorcising demons” to protect the town.

However…

Natsume, under the guise of a “patrol” around the city, will drag you all over the place. A shopping district with an amusement park!? A park with a pool!? A card shop!? For Natsume, dealing with monsters is of no concern!

High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the carefree Natsume, you’ll still carry out your duty of monster extermination…

Character

  • Natsume Kamishiro (voiced by Natsume Kamishiro) – “Alright, let’s go play right away… I mean, let’s go on patrol!” High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the innocent and carefree Natsume, you carry out your duty of fighting against monsters… A childhood friend who loves you very much and never misses a day of showing their affection.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/natsume-ryoran-romance-of-hi-spec-yoko-for-ps4-now-available
